channel.title: Item pickup problem
channel.description:
hello im haveing a problem with my pickup for client items it looks like this:
.. armadyl godsword pickup armadyl godsword walk here examine armadyl godsword cancel
som1 plz tell me how to fix greatly apriceated

item.title: Item pickup problem
item.dc:creator: @wyatt1991 wyatt1991
item.description:
@wyatt1991 wrote:

tnt pk:

beacuse it over cache item ids

how can i fix this?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 14, 2008, 11:13:38 am[/size][hr][quote=“Scarr, post:3, topic:225761”]Well, if you mean that’s what happens after you die and your item appears on the ground or if you just drop it and it does that, just right-click it and click the “pickup armadyl godsword” option.[/quote]

its there when u drop or kill som1 and i want it gone lol plz help

Read full topic

item.title: Item pickup problem
item.dc:creator: @Scarr Scarr
item.description:
@Scarr wrote:

Well, if you mean that’s what happens after you die and your item appears on the ground or if you just drop it and it does that, just right-click it and click the “pickup armadyl godsword” option.

Read full topic
